body_html:
i still can't fix this problem
ls -l /path/to/cuda/lib/libcud* ls: cannot access '/path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*': No such file or directory
but i knew how to fix the original problem.
Tensorflow hasn't supported cudnn 6.0 yet.
so i changed to cudnn5.1. it is working now.

body:
i still can't fix this problem 
`ls -l /path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*
ls: cannot access '/path/to/cuda/lib/libcud*': No such file or directory
`
but  i knew how to fix the original problem.
Tensorflow  hasn't supported  cudnn 6.0 yet.
so i changed to cudnn5.1. it is working now.
